overview.en: ZVChain is a multi-layered blockchain solutions designed for high performance, throughput rates, scalable and efficient blockchain infrastructure for enterprise use. Built on top of the Chiron consensus algorithm.
overview.zh: ZVChain 是基于最新的Chiron共识算法，通过VRF+BLS的工作机制搭建的一条高安全性、高性能的专业化金融公链。ZVChain致力于为金融行业提供高安全、可监管、易扩展的数字金融基础设施和服务。
